column5: Hi everyone, I was updating some profile information when i noticed, a manage Facebook connect option i click it with no joy, no option i logged into facebook and tried it again and still no joy....i need assistance if anyone know how this works and what to do.....Thank you  This is how i got there.....  Ontario Fishing Community Home - Your control panel - Profile - Change Profile Information - Manage Facebook Connect
If there is a way to fix it if possible,one of the mods will certainly chime in.

I don't like all my websites and forums connected so I don't use log in with facecrook on anything, but if it is enabled on this forum you should have to log out then click the log in with facebook link that is if it is enabled here..then after that you can manage Facebook connection
Okay got it, Thank You. I now understand.....
